attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app I saw this really ugly orange racist thing and it make me profusely vomit. Don't download unless you are racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic and xenophobic. Did I miss anything?
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: I used to be a hard core conservative, but then I downloaded this app. It made me open my eyes to the world and see that in fact Donald J. Trump is a clown.
attributes.title: I was a republican

attributes.review: This whole app is a scam! It is a lie created by liberals to make our lord and savior seem evil! One post read, and I quote “Donald Trump bans trans people from the military!” Our lord and savior would never do that!!!
attributes.title: ITS A SCAM!!!

attributes.review: absolutely disgusting trash app... should never ever ever download it will bug your phone and record personal data. DO NOT GET IT

attributes.review: No❤️ this app was so bad. I opened it and all it was was a bunch of trump supporters porn. It was highly inappropriate and so unprofessional 🙈 if you want a good reliable app, get tik tok or play cool math games :) SUCH A WASTE OF TIME
attributes.title: Nastyyyyyy💓💫🤪🥞😻💍
